燤字的基本解释

燤
tài
〔燤焥（
刬 ）〕烟貌。

燤
liè
火断。

燤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tài］
［《集韻》他代切，去代，透。］
见“燤焥”。
[②]［liè］
［《類篇》力蘖切，入薛，來。］
火断。

燤字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燤； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页684第28
【集韻】他代切，音貸。燤焥，煙貌。　又【類篇】他達切，音闥。義同。　又力蘖切，音列。火斷也。◎按集韻十七薛無燤字，惟有爄字，訓火斷也。類篇疑誤。

燤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
燤字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tài］
["Jiyun" he cuts on his behalf, goes on behalf of, and thoroughly. ]
See "燤焥".
[②]［liè］
["Classic Pian" cuts hard, enters Xue, come. ]
Fire off.
Ignorant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燤; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 684 28
[Jiyun] He cuts on behalf of him, with sound loan.燤焥, smoky appearance.　[Classes] Tadachi, Yintai. The same meaning.　I tried hard to cut again, the sound series. The fire is broken. ◎According to the seventeen words of Ji Yun, Xue Wuxuan, only the word "爄", the fire is broken. Mistakes in the category.
